<e:Skin class="panels.PanelVisitPrincessSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="750" height="1333" states="meet,again,get,battle_7001,battle_7002" >
	<e:Group bottom="155" horizontalCenter="0" width.meet="100%" width="100%">
		<e:Image y="338" source="common_panel_info_red_bg" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Group width="100%" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="0" height="650">
			<e:Image includeIn="get,battle_7001,battle_7002" x="314" y="120.98" source="visit_label_princess" />
			<e:Image id="imgPrincess" x="0" y="0" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
			<e:Rect id="bodyMask" width="100%" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" height="650" y="0" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
			<e:Button id="btnWatch" label="查看妃子" includeIn="get,battle_7001,battle_7002" horizontalCenter="115" bottom="24" skinName="ui.LinkButtonSkin"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Label id="labStr" size="21" text="　　妾身有幸得遇万岁爷，实在是几辈子修的福，但妾身尚有家事未了，无法随万岁爷入宫，望万岁爷宽恕" x="281.88" textColor="0xFFFFFF" width="404" text.again="　　万岁爷带臣妾重游故地，让臣妾想起那时与万岁爷相遇的情景，臣妾对万岁爷的恩情感激不尽，臣妾愿一生相伴万岁爷左右" text.get="　　臣妾蒙万岁爷恩宠，深感天恩浩荡。臣妾愿随万岁爷入宫，时刻服侍左右。" anchorOffsetX.get="0" width.get="404" x.get="281.88" text.meet="　　妾身有幸得遇万岁爷，实在是几辈子修的福，但妾身尚有家事未了，无法随万岁爷入宫，望万岁爷宽恕" lineSpacing.meet="15" lineSpacing="15" x.again="281.88" bottom.meet="123" bottom.again="123" bottom.get="123" bottom="123" text.battle_7001="　　万岁爷在马上征战的英姿真是深深的折服了妾身，恳请万岁爷恩准妾身入宫，能够朝夕侍奉左右。" anchorOffsetX.battle_7001="0" width.battle_7001="404" x.battle_7001="281.88" bottom.battle_7001="97" text.battle_7002="　　可怜妾身被外族虏获，全仗万岁爷率军平定了外族，才得以重见天日，如今妾身愿随万岁爷入宫，侍奉左右。" anchorOffsetX.battle_7002="0" width.battle_7002="404" x.battle_7002="281.88" bottom.battle_7002="97"/>
		<e:Label id="labEffect" size="23" y="555" text="安茜好感度+1" x="418.06" textColor="0x00ff00" x.meet="418.06" y.meet="555" includeIn="meet,again,get"/>
		<e:Label id="labGoal" size="20" y="606" text="好感度达到40时可以获得" x="329" includeIn="meet" textColor="0xffffff"/>
		<e:Label id="labLikeValue" size="20" y="606" text="(当前35)" x="552" textColor="0x00FF00" includeIn="meet"/>
		<e:Group x="305.3" y="357.01">
			<e:Image x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="common_panel_info_red_name_bg"/>
			<e:BitmapLabel id="labName" y="-1.33" text="若曦" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" horizontalCenter="0" horizontalCenter.get="0" horizontalCenter.battle_7001="0" horizontalCenter.battle_7002="0" font="princess_name_2"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>

</e:Skin>

<e:Skin class="scenes.SceneUnionSkin" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:alien="alien.*" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" states="no_union,my_union">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="enter_no_union">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{layout}">
				<tween:To duration="200" ease="cubicOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object gap="{20}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{grpDialog}">
				<tween:Wait duration="150" />
				<tween:To duration="200" ease="cubicOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{1}" scaleY="{1}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{imgBody}">
				<tween:To duration="200" ease="cubicOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{200}" alpha="{1}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="leave_no_union">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{layout}">
				<tween:To duration="200" ease="cubicIn">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object gap="{-57}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="enter_my_union">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{list}">
				<tween:To duration="250" ease="cubicOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object right="{0}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{group}">
				<tween:To duration="250" ease="cubicOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{0}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{group0}">
				<tween:To duration="250" ease="cubicOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object bottom="{0}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="leave_my_union">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{list}">
				<tween:To duration="250" ease="cubicIn">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object right="{-750}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{group}">
				<tween:To duration="250" ease="cubicIn">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{-750}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{group0}">
				<tween:To duration="250" ease="cubicIn">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object bottom="{-316}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Group top="66" bottom="0" width="100%" touchEnabled="false">
		<e:Group width="100%" touchEnabled="false" height="70" includeIn="my_union">
			<e:Group verticalCenter="5" x="30">

				                 field="我的职位:" value="0" />

				                 field="个人贡献:" value="0" />
